page.title: 06Redlynch School,Gypsy Topic
page.content: Just south of Lover is an area called Bohemia, apparently so called because gypsies lived there.This term we have been finding out about the gypsy way of life in 1810.We have made benders, formed gypsy families and worked in gypsy clothes. On June 26th we met "gypsy tribes" from five other schools at Odstock, for a{gypsy fair}and to re-enact the true story of Joshua Scamp, a gypsy who was hung in 1810 for a crime he did not commit. To our surprise we have{real } {travellers}in Redlynch now (July 1985).Their canvas topped "vardo" is parked in Goggs Lane, horses and a family of chickens feeding on the verge.A board announces ,"Pegs for sale".
